verses.translation: By the fig and the olive

verses.text: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ فِيٓ أَحۡسَنِ تَقۡوِيمٖ
verses.translation: We have certainly created man in the best of stature
verses.transliteration: Laqad khalaqna alinsana fee ahsani taqweemin

verses.translation: Then We return him to the lowest of the low

verses.text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونٖ
verses.translation: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds, for they will have a reward uninterrupted
verses.transliteration: Illa allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati falahum ajrun ghayru mamnoonin

verses.translation: So what yet causes you to deny the Recompense
Is not Allah the most just of judges
